metadata.title: CVE-2017-8065 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: crypto/ccm.c in the Linux kernel 4.9.x and 4.10.x through 4.10.12 interactsincorrectly with the CONFIG_VMAP_STACK option, which allows local users tocause a denial of service (system crash or memory corruption) or possiblyhave unspecified other impact by leveraging use of more than one virtualpage for a DMA scatterlist.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
